name: Teachable
title: teachable.com
shortDescription: Teachable allows creators to share their knowledge through various digital products like online courses, coaching, and digital downloads. It's designed for educators, coaches, and entrepreneurs who want to monetize their expertise. Users can start with basic features and upgrade as their business grows, making it ideal for both new and expanding businesses.
pros: Supports multiple types of digital products
cons: May require marketing knowledge to drive sales

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Podia
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on digital downloads and memberships
